response.overview: We travelled far and wide to find ourselves in Seoul with the awesome guys from WeMade FOX as they tell us their story of being a true blue professional gamer in South Korea. Flying all over the world, having hordes of fans and wearing cool jerseys are just part and parcel of being a keyboard cowboy.  Discover these players in their element as they talk about training, winning and life outside competitive gaming.
response.title: The Hax Life
